Text: Why is it labeled 2008? Thanks in advanced! Been waiting all night to watch this!

This TV show is odd: the plot is simple and the budget is obviously limited, but the total experience (actor performance, execution) makes it addicting. An old good and easy-to-watch fairy tale. Highly recommeded for family evenings.
yep, its the acting that attracts me.
